website_summaries.verdict: These strong 16-foot straps are made of high-quality polyester, release easily, and have a weight limit of 500 pounds. Use them for moving larger vehicles as well as smaller items.
pros: These versatile straps secure belongings tightly and release quickly without the formation of knots
cons: The metal of the buckles is thinner than that of some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Holds Tight, Dye runs
customer_reviews.text: The straps work very well and hold the gas can rack firmly on my jet-ski. The black dye of the strap will run when wet. A solution was to soak the straps in a bucket of water over night then take them out to dry. It works and the straps have lightened in color and the dye no longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: BrianK828

customer_reviews.title: There's no way these meet the rated strength listed
customer_reviews.text: I destroyed the first one I used. They were a lot thinner than I had anticipated and not any thicker than the others listed with lower rated strength. The strap broke where it went through the buckle. I can probably use the other two so I'm not sending them back but if you need something heavier, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Add a cloth between the strap and your car to protect the paint!
customer_reviews.text: These 2 straps held a mattress on top of my car for a few miles going about 30mph. Im sure they would've held up going faster for a much longer distance. I gave it 4 stars because the straps turned my hands black and it left black scuffs on my white car! I recommend a layer between the strap and any part of it that touches your paint!
customer_reviews.author: Klou333

customer_reviews.title: Tie Down> I use these to tie down my grill ...
customer_reviews.text: Tie Down> I use these to tie down my grill gazebo on each corner as insurance it won't blow over from the wind.The catches are solid as I ran the straps around each corner into a 16 inch coil in cement in the ground.The orange coils I ordered from Amazone too.
customer_reviews.author: theloneroo

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Ther straps and wimpier buckles than the brand names, but the get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dryflyguy

customer_reviews.title: Light duty use, but still a good value.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine. The buckle is thinner metal than another pair I purchased at OKC Kayak, but I think these will be okay overall.
customer_reviews.author: Allarus

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, not great. When traveling, the item we secured with these straps slid, so there was a need to stop and tighten on the road. Also, they leave a horrible black stain on your hands when using, AND, we drove through rain and the straps absorbed this and stained the roof of our interior. Overall, not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Function Properly
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of regular use, they hold a good amount of weight for long periods of time without slipping or stretching. Great product, worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ian Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic straps
customer_reviews.text: Needed long straps, these work well. I did have to wipe them before use since a black residue would get on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: MAN

customer_reviews.title: and long which is great as we have a minivan
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. firm grip, and long which is great as we have a minivan. Held our cargo bags firmly with no movement whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: phatboykim

customer_reviews.title: Black dye problem
customer_reviews.text: When I took them out of the bag my hands turned black. Whatever dye they used, it wasn’t very waterproof. On a whim I put them in water since these were going to be used outside. The water in the bowl turned black. I wouldn’t use these on any fabric or object you don’t want to turn black.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Cox

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be OK. Not very thick material, so time will tell if they hold up???
customer_reviews.text: Thin material! Time will be the judge on durability?? Always wanting a review before you can really make an honest one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lookingood

customer_reviews.title: Solid, but dye runs
customer_reviews.text: A solid product. As others have said, the dye runs staining anything light coloured.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mead

customer_reviews.title: Strong and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These simple but strong straps should be in every car trunk. Truly handy!
customer_reviews.author: New Englander - Route 95

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre straps, color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: The buckle and strap aren’t as sturdy as I expected. I ended up purchasing some NRS straps after receiving these. The NRS straps were exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: James Potts

customer_reviews.title: Great straps, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I had been looking for to secure kayaks to my roof carrier. I took the advise of other reviews and soaked the straps in a bucket of water for a couple days to get the excess die off.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Wimer

customer_reviews.title: and work great. I’m using them to strap down a tarp ...
customer_reviews.text: These straps are very rugged, and work great. I’m using them to strap down a tarp over my outdoor hot tub for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Straps
customer_reviews.text: Liked them but the black dye comes off pretty easy in your hands so be ready for that.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Franz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use holds things in place very well.
customer_reviews.text: I found the straps to be very strong, easy to use, and held things in place that I needed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Straps work well and are easy to use. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use these to strap kayaks to my roof rack. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The black dye easily rubs off on anything the strap touches.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pepper

customer_reviews.title: get them 2 feet longer
customer_reviews.text: they work great just wish they had them 2 inch thick.
customer_reviews.author: omar rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: it helped with moving. If not strapped too tightly ...
customer_reviews.text: it helped with moving. If not strapped too tightly, it will make noise on the roof and will chip the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Teemo

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!! Smells like dirty motor oil and ruined my white sheet.
customer_reviews.text: Took out of the package and noticed the smell right away. As I unravelled each one I set on the bed I was going to use these on. By the 2nd one I couldn't stand the smell so I went to throw in the wash and noticed it was all over my hands and on the sheet I set it on. Tie downs are now on the 2nd wash cycle because after washing the smell and dye bleed was still very noticable. SO irritating and I definitely do not recommend these
customer_reviews.author: AyeDo

customer_reviews.title: Only buy for very low pressure needs they will break
customer_reviews.text: The metal buckle the strap goes through is so cheap it just snaped in half when I tried to tighten it down. Very frustrating because I had to replace the other three I had put on my Ladder sticks for fear they would break on me when climbing up to my treestand. VERY UNSAFE
customer_reviews.author: msu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful straps and long enough for the longest hang!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful straps, wonderful value! I'm good on Hammock straps now for the next 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Detman101

product_meta.title: Audew Heavy Duty Lashing Straps — 4Pk x 16Ft — 500 lbs Load Cap/1500 lbs Break Strength — Cam Buckle tie Down Straps for Motorcycles, Lawn Equipment, Moving Appliances — Cargo Tie Down Straps Upgrade Without Fading
feature_bullets: 【100% WATERPROOF】Our ratchet straps are woven with high-density, high-quality polyester webbing fibers and can be used in rainy days without deformation.
【LONG AND POWERFUL ENOUGH】16-foot-long strap with 1,500 lbs of breaking strength and high-quality cast zinc alloy die cam mechanism that allows you to use safely.
【QUICK AND DURABLE】Releasing the straps is very quick and no knotting.The cargo is firmly secured after being locked away, and no further fear of damage to the costly goods.
【MULTIUSE STRAPS】These heavy duty lashing straps can be used not only for motorcycles, vans, bicycles, but also including moving the lawn equipment of your backyard or moving sundries from your home.

【100% GUARANTEE】All ratchet straps have passed rigorous tests. Please feel free to contact us if there are any quality issues. We will exchange or refund for you. Focus on providing you with quality service!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
